content.p: We offer a range of highly competitive courses at undergraduate and postgraduate levels, as well as PhDs and professional degrees. We aim to provide a diverse and inspiring environment for the scientific study of the mind and brain, on both our Nottingham and Malaysia campuses. The quality of our teaching was recognized by the most recent national teaching assessment (QAA), where the School scored the maximum 24/24. Undergraduate courses Postgraduate taught courses Doctorate In Applied Educational Psychology Research courses Some of our courses offer you the chance to study abroad at the University's Malaysia campus. Second year undergraduates can apply for a paid summer internship within the school. It's never too early to think about your career, and we have a number of resources available for you. Find a PhD supervisor University Park The University of Nottingham Nottingham, NG7 2RD For all enquires please visit: www.nottingham.ac.uk/enquire
